text:
i am new HubSpot

I created my HubSpot chat flows and added Install Tracking Code to my html page before </body>

`<!-- Start of HubSpot Embed Code -->`
`<script type="text/javascript" id="hs-script-loader" async defer src="<//js-na1.hs-scripts.com/1*******.js>"></script>`
`<!-- End of HubSpot Embed Code -->`

example:

`.....`
`</div>`
`</footer>`
`<!-- Start of HubSpot Embed Code -->`
`<script type="text/javascript" id="hs-script-loader" async defer src="<//js-na1.hs-scripts.com/1*******.js>"></script>`
`<!-- End of HubSpot Embed Code -->`
`</body>`

`</html>`


but still the chat windows are not showing on my webpage and i checked inspect - network so it got status 200 successfully but still not showing any window

Hi guys,
I just joined the Dev Slack. I would need your dev super powers for a bug I have in my Registration Page. The mobile View for one element is not fully responsive and I need a short code snippet to adjust it.
here is the issue- the 1, 2 and 3 are too far on the right side and get partially hidden:
<@U05E05NAV8W> Send the link here please?
<@U05DS664NGP> Please check the targeting in chatflow.

Hello everyone, I need help to disable cookie tracking in HubSpot application as we are using third party cookies tracking. I have tried deactivating cookies, but still browser is tracking cookies even before user's cookie consent. Can anyone suggest me if I am missing anything. I disabled cookies by deactivating in banner settings.

<@UPDDTPW3H>
yes i checked the chatflow and urls all checked but still not showing
Ex:
<http://www.domain.com|www.domain.com>
<@U05DS664NGP> I need the access to check that.
Hey everyone
I am stuck in a weird issue. We have blog on HubSpot. Our SEO guys updated us that few of the blog posts are redirecting and having page is not working error. Same link was working fine.
All the posts which have the blog tag in the url are not loading. For example.

domain/blog/tag/posttile (not loading)
domain/blog/posttile(loading fine)

Hello Everyone
One of my clients who has a nursery in the UK would like to sync <https://www.famly.co/> with HubSpot so that all the data sits within the same location. Can anyone let me know if this is possible? If so, how would you suggest approaching it? Thanks. Juliet
I guess it kind of depends what is really meant by "..sync with HubSpot" - that can be quite extensive  and complex, or simple and easy.

Hello Andreas,

It is nice to meet you. Thanks for your prompt reply.

Much of their client data and conversations happen within Famly - when they get a new customer through Famly they'd like to ensure the data is going to HubSpot. I'm meeting with the client tomorrow morning so I will get the specs. Any particular questions I should ask?
What Data should be synced, how often should be synced... though i have to say, integrations are not my speciality. For that i would suggest contacting <@U25PYL3Q8> or <@U01QVR44MEY>
Budget.. Integrations can be quite complex and therefore a lot of work
Thanks for the CC <@UBT0AHWLD>. <@U020SSLDR1U> Looks like Famly has a pretty extensive api. <https://docs.famly.co/>
Think that an integration should be pretty straightforward

Looks like famly only supports a GQL api though, so just for pulling data out and not pushing data back in. Also doesn't look like they support webhooks, so it wouldn't be super instant for the data syncs (Some apis support mutations so you could push data in but not all of them)

Thanks, <@U01QVR44MEY> excellent first name, by the way :slightly_smiling_face:
That's good to know. I wonder what "super instant" means. One way is fine I imagine. Would the client need at least HubSpot marketing Pro? What would the integration entail? Thanks!

Thanks Juliet, so by super instant I basically mean Famly doesn't have a way to tell another system that something has changed (webhooks) so you have to ask Famly every once in a while to check if something has changed
You can also trigger the sync with a button or checkbox (this is usually the best way), or with a deal stage
Got it - so they have to manually do it or do it through a HubSpot workflow to trigger it.
Do you know if you need marketing pro to do this or would she need enterprise? Thanks!
so to trigger it through a workflow you'll need ops hub pro
(because you need custom coded actions)
And yeah by manually do it, I mean manually trigger the sync (not manually copy over the data)
And the one way sync only applies to certain objects on the famly end (certain ones support pushing data in but not all of them)
Thanks! Marketing Pro doesn't do custom coded actions? She would have to get Operations Hub Pro?
Yeah I'm 90% sure that's correct. I don't have an account that doesn't have ops hub pro or ent so can't tell you for sure
CC <@U022ANB8ZC4> you need pro/enterprise ops hub for CCA right?
The docs don't say: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/workflows/custom-code-actions>
You need Ops Hub Pro for custom code!
thanks Emma, appreciate the reply
Thanks team!! Really appreciate it. I will see what the client says about upgrading. Is this something that you could support us on if they decide to go  forward? <@U01QVR44MEY>
yeah of course, I can definitely help you out on this

<@U020SSLDR1U> - just chiming in that <@U01QVR44MEY> is one of the best around for this, and Ops Hub Pro is exceptionally inexpensive and (in my mind) near essential due to the massive enhancements your client will get from this.
